quote: My heart cracked. Daemon never begged.
author: Jennifer L. Armentrout,  Onyx

quote: I didn't want to spoil the mood. This was probably the longest Daemon and I had ever spoken without some statement earning him the finger.
author: Jennifer L. Armentrout,  Obsidian

quote: Daemon!"Dee called from the kitchen. "I need your help!""We should go see what she's doing before she destroys your kitchen."He rubbed his hands down his face. "It's possible.
author: Jennifer L. Armentrout,  Obsidian

quote: Ash is going to kick your ass, Daemon."Daemon's grin went up a notch. "Nah, she likes my ass too much for that.
author: Jennifer L. Armentrout,  Obsidian

quote: Dee loves it here. Before you came, she spent most of her days here."To Daemon, my arrival was the beginning of the end. The apocalypse. Kat-mageddon. "You know, I'm not going to get your sister in trouble.""We'll see.
author: Jennifer L. Armentrout,  Obsidian

quote: I have the feeling we just made a deal with the devil, and he's going to come back and want our first-born child or something."Daemon waggled his brows. "You want kids? Because you know, practice makes--""Shut up."I shook my head and started walking.
author: Jennifer L. Armentrout,  Opal

quote: Daemon pressed his forehead against mine. "Oh, I still want to strangle you. But I'm insane. You're crazy. Maybe that's why. We just make crazy together.
author: Jennifer L. Armentrout,  Onyx

quote: A few seconds after he stepped out into the hallway and closed the door behind him, there was a fleshly smack and then Andrew yelling, “Ouch. What in the hell was that for?” “Your timing sucks on an epic level,” Daemon shot back.
author: Jennifer L. Armentrout,  Opal

quote: How long have you been standing there?""Just long enough to see you give Daemon the middle finger.""He deserved it.
author: Jennifer L. Armentrout,  Obsidian

quote: Your mail could've waited."Daemon followed me into the kitchen. "What is it? Just books?"Grabbing the OJ from the fridge, I sighed. People who didn't heart books didn't understand.
author: Jennifer L. Armentrout,  Onyx

quote: The Pompous Psychopomp Its your charge to provide me safe passage to the afterlife,to be a midwife to my dying.Any yet, you hover there, judging me,putting on airs, you supercilious whip-poor-will.You're an embarrassment to nightjars everywhere.Now do your fucking job and take me to hell ~which I guess has already begun,judging by your shitty escort service.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: Got it. Demon. Death. Doom.
author: Kami Garcia,  Beautiful Creatures

quote: You're gonna have to serve somebody; well, it may be the devil, or it may be the Lord, but you're gonna have to serve somebody...
author: Bob Dylan

quote: A mind possessed by unmade books.
author: Michael Faudet

quote: If there was a God. I would spit in his face for subjecting me to this. If there was a Devil, I would sell my sould to make it end. If there was something Higher that controlled out f***ing fates, I would tell it to take my fate and shove it up its fucking ass. Shove it hard and far, you motherf***er. Please end. Please end. Please end.
author: James Frey,  A Million Little Pieces

quote: What matters creative endless toil, When, at a snatch, oblivion ends the coil?
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe,  Faust: Der Tragödie erster und zweiter Teil. Urfaust

quote: Your soul is the priestess of memory, selecting, sifting, and ultimately gathering your vanishing days toward presence.
author: John O'Donohue,  Anam Cara: A Book of Celtic Wisdom

quote: The mind is a wonderful servant, but a terrible master.
author: Robin S. Sharma

quote: It matters not how strait the gate, How charged with punishments the scroll, I am the master of my fate: I am the captain of my soul.
author: William Ernest Henley,  Echoes of Life and Death;

quote: [Horror fiction] shows us that the control we believe we have is purely illusory, and that every moment we teeter on chaos and oblivion.
author: Clive Barker

quote: God sends meat and the devil sends cooks.
author: Thomas Deloney

quote: Because this absolutely insane - the craziest thing I'd ever done. Worse than giving a one-star review, scarier than asking for an interview with an author I'd give my firstborn to eat lunch with, more stupid than kissing Daemon.
author: Jennifer L. Armentrout,  Obsidian

quote: The unfed mind devours itself.
author: Gore Vidal

quote: Any writer worth his salt writes to please himself...It's a self-exploratory operation that is endless. An exorcism of not necessarily his demon, but of his divine discontent.
author: Harper Lee

quote: I am your Prince and you will marry me,"Humperdinck said.Buttercup whispered, "I am your servant and I refuse.""I am you Prince and you cannot refuse.""I am your loyal servant and I just did.""Refusal means death.""Kill me then.
author: William Goldman,  The Princess Bride

quote: the serpent if it wants to become the dragon must eat itself.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: I want to live my life in such a way that when I get out of bed in the morning, the devil says, "aw shit, he's up!
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: I AM THE MASTER OF MY FATE AND THE CAPTAIN OF MY DESTINY.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Love Haiku Sumerian whoregrabs my wedge, says: 'I love aman in cuneiform.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: God dances with the outcast.
author: Steven James,  How to Smell Like God: True Stories Burning with the Scent of Heaven

quote: In a time of destruction, create something.
author: Maxine Hong Kingston

quote: Psychotherapy [10w] If you can second guess a psychotherapist,they’re totally useless.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: You don’t have a soul, Doctor. You are a soul. You have a body, temporarily.
author: Walter M. Miller Jr.,  A Canticle for Leibowitz

quote: Caliph Vathek and his dark hordeAre bound for Hell, you won’t be bored!Your faith in me will be restored—Unless this token you find untowardAnd my poor gift you have ignored.
author: Cassandra Clare,  Clockwork Prince

quote: Walking the stacks in a library, dragging your fingers across the spines -- it's hard not to feel the presence of sleeping spirits.
author: Robin Sloan,  Mr. Penumbra's 24-Hour Bookstore

quote: One who makes himself a worm cannot complain afterwards if people step on him.
author: Immanuel Kant

quote: You grow ravenous. You run fevers. You know exhilarations. You can't sleep at night, because your beast-creature ideas want out and turn you in your bed. It is a grand way to live.
author: Ray Bradbury,  Zen in the Art of Writing

quote: Sumerian Haiku Sumerian whoregrabs my wedge, says: 'I love aman in cuneiform.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: If your enemy is hungry, feed him; if he is thirsty, give him something to drink. In doing this, you will heap burning coals on his head.
author: Anonymous,  Holy Bible: King James Version

quote: I must create a system, or be enslaved by another man's. I will not reason and compare: my business is to create.
author: William Blake,  Jerusalem

quote: Mario, what do you get when you cross an insomniac, an unwilling agnostic and a dyslexic?""I give.""You get someone who stays up all night torturing himself mentally over the question of whether or not there's a dog.
author: David Foster Wallace,  Infinite Jest

quote: in a worldfull oftemporary thingsyou area perpetual feeling.
author: Sanober Khan

quote: Astriola. That IS demon pox. You had evidence that demon pox existed and you didnt mention it to me! Et tu, Brute!' He rolled up the paper and hit Jem over the head with it.
author: Cassandra Clare,  Clockwork Prince

quote: Never forget that there are only two philosophies to rule your life: the one of the cross, which starts with the fast and ends with the feast. The other of Satan, which starts with the feast and ends with the headache.
author: Fulton J. Sheen,  Seven Words of Jesus and Mary: Lessons from Cana and Calvary

quote: A single day spent doing things which fail to nourish the soul is a day stolen, mutilated, and discarded in the gutter of destiny.
author: Michel Faber,  The Crimson Petal and the White

quote: Serenity is when you get above all this, when it doesn't matter what they think, say or want, but when you do as you are, and see God and Devil as one.
author: Henry Miller

quote: Fueled by my inspiration, I ran across the room to steal the cup of coffee the bookshelf had taken prisoner. Lapping the black watery brew like a hyena, I tossed the empty cup aside. I then returned to the chair to continue my divine act of creation. Hot blood swished in my head as my mighty pen stole across the page.
author: Roman Payne,  Rooftop Soliloquy

quote: Affliction is often that thing which prepares an ordinary person for some sort of an extraordinary destiny.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Standing in the kitchen when you’re hungry is torture. That’s why I moved my fridge to my dungeon, where I keep the prisoners.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: Oh, aye, Sassenach. I am your master . . . and you're mine. Seems I canna possess your soul without losing my own.
author: Diana Gabaldon,  Outlander
